track.name: Count on Me
comments: A song dedicated to all true friends ♥

So sweet and so true...I would be that friend, too. Friends, often even more than family, are what really matter. If we aren't there when there is need, we have no right to think we are a friend...or deserve one.
If you like Bruno Mars this is your site. Please, Join Us! Bruno Mars
This Song is Great ♥♥♥ .... You can count on me like 1 2 3. I'll be there. [4]
You can count on me like 1 2 3. I'll be there. [3]
I'll sail the world to find you. If you ever find yourself lost in the dark and you can't see then I'll be the light to guide you ♥ So beautiful! :,)
I loveeeee this song, sooo sweeeeet <3 you Brunooooo
You Can Count On Me Like 1.2.3. & I'll Be There....And When I Need You I Can Count 4.3.2 & You'll Be There Coz Thats What Friends Are Supposed To Do. Ohh Yeahh.<3 :3
you can count on me like 123 and ill b there and i know when i need it i can count on you like 432 youll b there cause thats what friends r supposed to
so cheesy and bruno mars for some reason (for me at least) is hit or miss but this song is so cute and catchy lol
You can count on me like 1 2 3. I'll be there. [2]
